Name: onslaught
About the game: This is a fun melee type game. The rule of the game is to use the bow and arrow to attack the enemy. Come and join the bow and arrow fight! Introduction to the game 1. An interesting throwing shooting game, from which you need accurate calculations to hit the enemy; 2. While playing the game, I hope players can realize the harm of throwing objects at high altitude; 3. However, this feeling is so cool that I can hardly look at it directly. Game features 1. It is a great test of the player's prediction ability. You can only strike after aiming; 2. The game is easy to use and easy to operate; 3. It presents you with different interesting challenges, and presents you with more interesting venting challenges in a unique way. 4. It is a very simple game, which only needs one finger to control and control the archer to choose the angle and shoot.
